ingredients.content: 7 oz cantaloupe seeds and flesh, (from 1 melon)

preparations.content: Place melon seeds, sugar and 18 oz water into mixing bowl and blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add remaining 17 oz water, ground cinnamon and mix <b>1 min/speed 5<b>. Drain using a fine mesh strainer and serve with ice cubes.
